document_data.name: Wolf Spirits
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wolf spirits''''' was a special [[divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] and [[invocation]] [[quest spell]] from the [[animal sphere|animal]], [[guardian sphere|guardian]], and [[summoning sphere]]s that would summon a group of large [[wolf]] [[spirit]]s to serve the caster.
document_data.Effects: This spell summoned 4â€“10 special wolf spirts, or other applicable animal spirit, to serve the caster until their particular task was fulfilled or after fourteen days passed. If summoned to guard a particular location, the wolf spirits would remain for up to one hundred days.
document_data.Components: This spell did not require [[spell component]]s of any kind.
document_data.History: This spell was used by [[druid]]s who served [[Moander]] during the height of ancient [[Netheril]]'s power.
